name: Armageddon device
comment: Renders planet useless for the remainder of the game

name: Boosters
comment: Move an extra sector

name: Commm beacon
comment: You are alerted as to passing ships; also beacon bouy

name: Cargo  hull
comment: Extend the capacity of your ship by 10000 ore

name: Cruiser Frame
comment: This is the basis of your ship

name: CET
comment: Allows colonization of barren planets. Uses 1 cargo hull.(Adv

name: Drones
comment: Collects a set amount of ore per turn

name: Enhanced engine +1
comment: Provide 7 points of energy per engine

name: Enhanced engine +2
comment: Provide 9 points of energy per engine

name: Engines
comment: Provide 5 points of energy per engine

name: Factory 1
comment: Produces Items up to size 1

name: Factory 2
comment: Produces Items up to size 2

name: Factory 3
comment: Produces Items up to size 3

name: Imp globe generator
comment: creates an impenetrable field around ship. nothing gets in or out. No other actions maybe taken during this turn

name: LASER
comment: Causes 2 pts of dam per .1 of energy expended

name: Missles
comment: Causes 10pts of damage per shot fired

name: Mine field
comment: Lay a damage field in a sector

name: Money
comment: Money is what you spend to buy things

name: Nuke
comment: Kills 100 PEOPLE in a COLONY

name: Ore
comment: Basic Ore Sells for 1 unit of MONEY

name: Planetary defence battery
comment: Contains: 5 energy  10 armor  and 1 shield device

name: People
comment: are used to colonize. POP grows at 10% on ships

name: Refinery
comment: doubles networth of ore. refines up to 10000 per turn if you have enough cargo hulls

name: Enhanced scan +1
comment: Shows sectors in a 6x6 grid centered on U

name: Enhanced scan +2
comment: Shows sectors in a 7x7 grid centered on U

name: Star bomb
comment: star bomb blots out star for unknown amount of time

name: Scanner
comment: Shows map in a 5x5 grid with you in center

name: Shields
comment: Stops 3 pts of damage per .1 of energy spent

name: Spares
comment: Repair Damage 1:1

name: Teleporter 1
comment: Teleports upto size 1 anywhere in sector cannot breach shields

name: Teleporter 2
comment: Teleports upto size 2 anywhere in sector

name: Transporter bomb
comment: does 1 pt damage to engines

name: Torpedo launcher
comment: Launches torpedos

name: Torpedo
comment: Does 10 pts of damage can be fired into another sector in the advanced game

name: Tractor Beam
comment: Used to tow damaged Cruisers

name: Warp drive
comment: allows use of warp point

name: Warp point
comment: zip from one point in space to the next. uses 1/2 cargo hull
